metadata.title: CVE-2021-28091 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Lasso all versions prior to 2.7.0 has improper verification of acryptographic signature.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblasso-perl - 2.6.1-3
liblasso3 - 2.6.1-3
python3-lasso - 2.6.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lasso package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-3').
